description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The News' History of Passaic. From the earliest settlement to the present day. Embracing a descriptive history of its ... institutions with biographical sketches. Profusely illustrated. Compiled and edited by W. J. Pape with the collaboration of W. W. Scott" Author: PAPE, William J. Contributor: SCOTT, William W. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10408.r.9." Page: 292 Place of Publishing: Passaic, N.Y.] Date of Publishing: 1899 Publisher: [The News Publishing Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002763231 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
